newsitem.title: USA: ARXA Int'l buys interest in Utah well.
newsitem.headline: ARXA Int'l buys interest in Utah well.

text.p: ARXA International Energy Inc said on Thursday that it has acquired for undisclosed terms a 50 percent interest in a Utah natural gas well from Integrity Financial, a private Los Angeles oil and gas company.

The 12-17 Federal Well tested 1.9 million cubic feet per day of gas, ARXA said, adding that the test zone is estimated to contain 0.945 billion cubic feet of proven reserves. There is indication of a second zone with another estimated 1 billion cubic feet of probable reserves, ARXA said.
ARXA said it will jointly develop the well with Integrity. As part of their agreement, ARXA has preferential rights to buy 10,000 more acres, the company said.
